episodes.title: Martha Kartaoui- Escaping a religious cult to thrive and coach others how to heal and live healthy lives.
episodes.description:
Martha Kartaoui- Escaping a religious cult to thrive and coach others how to heal and live healthy lives.


Martha Kartaoui is a highly accomplished Certified Life and Health Coach, as well as a respected Spiritual Mentor and Life Visionary. She's the owner of PIC Wellness, LLC. With a remarkable personal journey as a survivor of a religious cult, Martha has fearlessly navigated her own uncharted healing journey and transformed her trauma into triumph. 


Through her own healing and growth, she has discovered a deep passion for empowering others to do the same, and has created a Trauma Recovery Coaching Program: Going All In. With her expertise and compassionate guidance, Martha is dedicated to assisting individuals on their path from being mere survivors to warriors in their own lives while learning tools to triumph over adversity and unlock their God given truest and highest potential. 


Her unique blend of professional training, personal experience, and spiritual wisdom enables her to walk alongside and support her clients profound transformations. Martha Kartaoui is a beacon of hope and inspiration, offering invaluable accountability, motivation and support to those seeking to reclaim their lives in order to thrive in their own journey towards self-discovery and divine fulfillment. Martha shares her own journey from Cult Survivor to Courageous Warrior in her book Glory: Going All In.
subjects: Samanta Roy Institute of Science and Technology
